short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A little helper for NFT speculation. Slightly modifies etherscan.io

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
On etherscan.io/nfttracker#mint page adds easy access links on collection
